timeline_and_schedule.highlight: End of Feb: preliminary numbers for EIP-7904 & 8037 for compatibility analysis
End of Feb: tooling ready including BOLA optimizations and Fusaka fork benchmarks
End of March: final repricing numbers with definitive BOLA integrated
April: testing, security analysis, and community issue resolution

eip_7904_compute_repricing.highlight: EIP-7904 downscoped to 13 operations performing below 60 Mgas/s floor
Excluded operations that Besu team can optimize by fork time
Numbers still preliminary: need Fusaka fork data and BOLA optimizations
POINT_EVALUATION increase impacts blob base fee floor calculation

eip_8037_state_growth.highlight: CREATE regular gas cost unbundled from state gas - numerical value undefined
SSTORE insert vs update may need different regular gas beyond state component
TX_MAX_GAS_LIMIT enforcement needed for intrinsic gas, not just execution
Receipt changes: cumulative gas semantics unclear with split gas accounting

refunds_and_receipts.highlight: Current spec: refunds applied to total gas (regular+state) using existing 20% rule
Proposal: subtract refunds from state gas only to incentivize cleanup
Receipt field addition: tradeoff between user analysis and implementation work

failure_modes_analysis.highlight: Failure mode 1: regular gas bottleneck leads to acceptable underutilization of state
Failure mode 2: state gas bottleneck causes compute/state access underutilization
Aggregation function choice impacts throughput and state growth under different demands

eip_updates.highlight: EIP-7976 & 7981 specs PR opened for data repricing review
EIP-2780: ETH transfer logs no longer free due to reduced transfer costs
EIP-7976: considering 64/64 calldata harmonization to avoid 10MB limit at 150M gas

l2_collaboration.highlight: OP Labs monitoring DA costs and proof system implications for L2 divergence
Request for better benchmarking collaboration to deduplicate L1/L2 work
EEST benchmark suite can generate fixtures for external orchestration tools

action_items.action: Update EIP-7904 to reflect POINT_EVALUATION impact on blob base fee floor
Document CREATE regular gas cost rationale and numerical derivation
Provide feedback on aggregation functions and failure modes analysis
Create PR for 64/64 calldata harmonization in EIP-7976 for 2-week review
Open thread in EL testing channel for L1/L2 benchmarking alignment

decisions.decision: EIP-7904 scope reduced to 13 operations below 60 Mgas/s floor only
Current refund mechanism (20% rule on total gas) retained as starting point
EIP-2780 will charge for ETH transfer logs based on component costs

targets.target: End of February - preliminary repricing numbers and specs finalized
End of March - final repricing numbers with BOLA optimizations
April - testing and security analysis period
